name: Pastel on the Run
description:
GAME BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN, OTHERWISE IT LOOK BAD.

Oh no! Prel has accidentally set off on a journey! While it's haunting for her, it should be some light-hearted rage gaming for the player! Join Prel as she races down the hall of the dead!

Please Note: This is my first unity project and I did not plan out the story from the beginning. This game was made for fun, and I haven't polished the game as this is my first 3D game as well. I hope you can enjoy the game, and that there aren't any game-breaking bugs.
